definitions.definition: A knife , especially a makeshift one fashioned from something not normally used as a weapon (like a plastic spoon or a toothbrush ).
A particular woody by-product of processing flax or hemp .

main_definition: A knife , especially a makeshift one fashioned from something not normally used as a weapon (like a plastic spoon or a toothbrush ).
secondary_definitions: A particular woody by-product of processing flax or hemp .
